name: Xylina Spathia
description:
'''Xylina Spathia''' ({{langx|el|Τα Ξύλινα Σπαθιά}}; {{Translation|}} 'The Wooden Swords') was a Greek rock band from [[Thessaloniki]], [[Greece]]. 

From 1993 to 2003, the band released five [[Album|albums]] and a [[CD single]]. Despite achieving early commercial success, the group avoided media exposure to maintain their artistic independence, continuously evolving their sound across albums while experimenting with improvisation during live performances.

Xylina Spathia has been described as one of the best-selling Greek bands, along with [[Pyx Lax]] and [[Trypes]]. The band has accumulated millions of streams on [[YouTube]], as well as various other platforms, such as [[Apple Music]] and [[Spotify]].
